content: वक्त्रं [वक्त्यनेन वच्-करणे ष्ट्रन्] {@--1@} The mouth. {@--2@} The face; यद्वक्त्रं मुहुरीक्षसे न धनिनां ब्रूषे न चाटून्मृषा <ls>Bh. 3. 147.</ls> {@--3@} Snout, muzzle, beak. {@--4@} Beginning. {@--5@} The point (of an arrow), the spout of a vessel. {@--6@} A sort of garment. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a metre similar to {%anushtubh%}; see <ls>S. D. 567</ls>; <ls>Kāv. 1. 26.</ls> {@--8@} The first term of a progression.
